snippet: The legislation, vetoed by the mayor on the ground that it was flawed, was aimed at seed companies developing genetically modified crops on the island of Kauai.
lead_paragraph: The legislation, vetoed by the mayor on the ground that it was flawed, was aimed at seed companies developing genetically modified crops on the island of Kauai.

headline.main: Bill Limiting Pesticide Use on Hawaii Island Is Vetoed
headline.print_headline: Bill Limiting Pesticide Use On Hawaii Island Is Vetoed
